system.summary: Repair a damaged trinket or gadget.

description.value: You can repair a fully broken trinket or gadget at ½ the material cost in ½ the sessions using the @Compendium[undertaking.tables.OANH1Q51JDEB8ETI]{Tinkercraft} table. Partially damaged objects require fewer parts and less time to repair, ask your GM for the difficulty and cost of a partial repair. Intelligence (Craft) checks to repair parts have a DC of 12.
